title: Quick pasta bake with tuna
ingredients: ['230g pasta, of your choice', '1 tin condensed cream of celery soup', '200ml milk', '1 (170g) tin tuna in water, drained', '100g frozen sweetcorn, thawed', '150g frozen broccoli florets, thawed', '100g frozen peas, thawed', '100g grated cheese', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
